data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who are far from you in Moxico. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Moxico, Angola
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Moxico, Angola need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Moxico.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 168,197 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Moxico, Angola know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Moxico.

data.section_summary:
the state of Moxico, Angola has a population of 727,600.

We estimate Moxico has 168,197 people who might know Jesus, 499,090 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 60,313 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 168,197 believers find a person of peace today among the 559,403 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”
